title: Powerade
text: POWERADE ISLAND BURST hydrates you with a great taste that includes tropical punch flavors. It takes more grind to dominate, so stock up on POWERADE today! Available Sizes:Â 28 fl oz WATER, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, LESS THAN 0.5% OF: CITRIC ACID, ELECTROLYTES (SALT, SODIUM CITRATE, MAGNESIUM AND CALCIUM CHLORIDES, MONO-POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE), NATURAL FLAVORS, VITAMINS B12 AND C (CYANOCOBALAMIN AND ASCORBIC ACID), MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, CALCIUM DISODIUM EDTA (TO PROTECT COLOR), MEDIUM CHAIN TRIGLYCERIDES, SUCROSE ACETATE ISOBUTYRATE, YELLOW 5, RED 40.
